Download

Partial sources are on github :

https://github.com/gbarrand/inexlib.git

We deliver here only part of inlib and exlib (and some ourex packages) needed to run the examples described in the inlib/exlib section of the softinex portal. To ease the installation of applications, the inlib/exlib/ourex needed to build the apps are delivered within each app repository. The main and full working repositories for inlib, exlib and ourex are at LAL.
